Package main

Class PathFinder

java.lang.Object
main.PathFinder
public class PathFinder
extends java.lang.Object
The PathFinder is responsible for calculating the path that a ghost may take to reach the player. It stores all information relevant to this process, and makes each ghosts next step available via public methods. This controller mainly serves as a way for the pathfinding algorithms to test if a particular path is blocked, or to determine the cost of a particular path.
Author:
Harry Felton - 18032692

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private static class  PathFinder.Node
    A inner class used to encapsulate information regarding the maps nodes, such as it's cost, position, and depth of path finding at the current moment of calculation.

  • Constructor Details

    • PathFinder

      public PathFinder​(PacmanGame g, int maxDepth) throws InvalidPathFindingException
      The PathFinder constructor
      Parameters:
      g - The PacmanGame instance the controller belongs to
      maxDepth - The maximum depth that the path finding will search
      Throws:
      InvalidPathFindingException - Thrown if no map is currently selected

  • Method Details

    • getPathCost

      private float getPathCost​(int x, int y)
      Returns the movement cost for a particular path. If a ghost is occupying this grid position, it's cost is raised to 5; otherwise a cost of 1 applies.
      Parameters:
      x - The X position of the path (grid relative)
      y - The Y position of the path (grid relative)
      Returns:
      Returns the movement cost of this path

    • getHeuristicCost

      private float getHeuristicCost​(int sX, int sY, int tX, int tY)
      Returns the heuristic cost of a path based on the manhattan distance.
      Parameters:
      sX - The starting X position (grid relative)
      sY - The starting Y position (grid relative)
      tX - The target X position (grid relative)
      tY - The target Y position (grid relative)
      Returns:
      The heuristic cost of this path.

    • calculatePath

      public Path calculatePath​(int sX, int sY, int tX, int tY)
      Returns a Path object containing all the information about the steps that need to be taken to reach the destination. Note that ALL position based arguments are GRID-BASED, not pixel based.
      Parameters:
      sX - The starting X position
      sY - The starting Y position
      tX - The target X position
      tY - The target Y position
      Returns:
      Returns the path details stored inside a Path object.

    • addToOpenNodes

      private void addToOpenNodes​(PathFinder.Node n)
      Adds a given node to the list of open nodes and resorts the collection. The Node inner class implements Comparable, allowing this sorting to sort based on the cost of a particular node as calculated currently.
      Parameters:
      n - The node to add to the open node list.
